abstract: A New Jersey client of the international banking giant UBS has been sentenced to five years probation after pleading guilty to concealing more than $6 million in assets in Swiss bank accounts.
snippet: A New Jersey client of the international banking giant UBS has been sentenced to five years probation after pleading guilty to concealing more than $6 million in assets in Swiss bank accounts.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey client of the international banking giant UBS has been sentenced to five years’ probation after pleading guilty to concealing more than $6 million in assets in Swiss bank accounts, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: UBS Client Sentenced to 5 Years’ Probation
